name: Jim Murray
goal:
To promote knowledge and discussion on science, transparency and medicine in the EU.

To provide advice and representation on best practice in policies relating to consumers, competition, and public affairs.
interests: Competition, Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Enterprise, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Home Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Justice and Fundamental Rights, Public Health, Research and Technology
euInitiatives: Public health; consumer policy; food; financial services; Access to medicines
